title: Trade Agreement
blocka: Action: Spend 3 resource dice of type a faction wants. Gain a number of resource dice of type the faction gives equal to faction disposition.

title: Resource Gathering
blocka: Action: Add dice to any one resource pool until it equals the given resource track.

title: Exploring the Realm
blocka: Action: Spend 4 fortune to place one progress.
blockb: Immediate: Spend 3 progress to increase any resource track by one.

title: Development Research
blocka: Action: Purchase one available development. If put into play immediately, ignore any play cost.

title: Amber Lodge
blockb: Action: Character spends 8 progress to remove one condition.

title: Diplomatic Investments
blocka: Action: Spend 4 luxury to place one progress.
blockb: Immediate: Spend 3 progress to increase any faction disposition track by one.
